item.title: Convert Elastic Units
item.description: Python functions to convert (Elastic) bytes/timing units to human readable format. Human API flag Elasticsearch’s API offers multiple performance statistics for bytes/timing that can have human readable, sister-columns emitted via ?human API flag. This human view can be very helpful on interpretting e.g. Node Stats, Index Stats, Repository Metering, Index Recovery, Node Tasks, and ILM Explain. However, sometimes we need a middle-step calculation to make these emitted stats more usable/interpretable.
